be beauty studio

Thank you for coming to this fledgling online space for Be Beauty Studio. I design and create products that reflect and inspire YOUR unique beauty. My current offerings include bracelets for both children and adults, holiday ornaments and OH-IO bracelets for all of the Scarlet and Grey fans amongst us.

I look forward to connecting with you!
Lydia

Items pictured may not be available for purchase, but can be made to your specifications. I am taking custom orders for all product types except holiday ornaments.

Use the contact form below to get things started.
  1. Select the product type of interest and tell me what you are looking for.
  2. I will respond within 24 hours to discuss and confirm the details of your order.
  3. Upon completion of your order, I will send detailed pictures for your review.
  4. Finally, we will determine payment and delivery details. I can currently offer the following options:
Delivery Options
  • JPMC employees: FREE delivery at the Easton and/or Polaris campus OR at home addresses within 8 miles of my home.
  • All other customers: Free delivery within 5 miles of my home or an agreed upon location within this range. $5 delivery fee within 12 miles of my home. All other orders will be shipped with $4 shipping fee.
Payment Options
  • Pay in person via Square at time of delivery.
  • Pay via Venmo prior to delivery (great for folks not available for face to face delivery!)
I will never share your email with anyone else.
